trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs object is passed to event handlers for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs 对象传递给事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You use the LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs object to manually specify what data is returned, and how the data is sorted and paged when it is returned.
trans-unit.target: 你使用 LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs 对象手动指定会返回哪些数据，并排序和分页时它返回的数据的方式。

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add or remove parameters to the GroupBy, OrderBy, OrderGroupsBy, Select, and Where clauses by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters%2A> collections.
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式添加或删除参数 GroupBy、 OrderBy、 OrderGroupsBy、 选择，以及在何处使用子句<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A> property enables you to change the data object that is used for the query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>属性使您可以更改用于此查询的数据对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you assign an object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A> property, that object will be used for queries instead of the object specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将对象分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>属性，该对象将用于查询而不是中指定的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property enables you to customize how returned data is sorted and paged.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A>属性使您可以自定义如何返回的数据的排序和分页。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data-bound control passes sorting and paging properties through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件将排序和分页属性通过传递<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have to manually handle sorting or paging, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> property or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要手动处理排序或分页，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制转移到`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then perform the customized query for sorting or paging in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后你可以执行自定义的查询进行排序或处理程序中的分页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> property is set to `true`, you must return a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>属性设置为`true`，您必须返回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The values that are passed from the data-bound control that determine how the data is paged and sorted.
trans-unit.target: 从数据绑定控件传递确定分页和排序数据的方式的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments*> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.Arguments*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameters that is used to create the Where clause.
trans-unit.target: 参数的集合，用于创建 Where 子句。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters*> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.WhereParameters*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameters that is used to create the Order By clause.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建 Order By 子句的参数集合中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters*> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderByParameters*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameters that is used to create the Group By clause.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建 Group By 子句的参数集合中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters*> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.GroupByParameters*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameter that is used to create the clause that is used for sorting grouped data.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建用于排序的子句的参数的集合分组数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters*> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.OrderGroupsByParameters*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of parameters that is used to create the Select clause.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建 Select 子句的参数集合中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters*> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs.SelectParameters*>

trans-unit.source: Gets values that determine how the data is returned.
trans-unit.target: 获取确定如何返回的数据的值。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control passes properties to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control through the Arguments property in order to specify how paging and sorting should occur.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件将属性传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控制通过才能指定进行分页和排序方式参数属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control automatically sorts or pages based on the properties from the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件自动进行排序或基于从数据绑定控件的属性的分页。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can customize how the data is sorted and paged from a query by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> properties to `false` and then creating a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义排序和分页从查询通过设置数据的方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A>属性设置为`false`，然后创建的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoSort%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, use the Arguments property to retrieve the sorting and paging properties from the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 在事件处理程序中，使用的参数属性，以检索排序和分页从数据绑定控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Then customize the query as needed, based on the properties from the Arguments property.
trans-unit.target: 然后查询根据需要自定义，根据从参数属性的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object is set to `true`, you must return a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>对象设置为`true`，您必须返回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.TotalRowCount%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.RetrieveTotalRowCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains values for determining how the data is returned.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于确定如何返回的数据值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the GroupBy clause.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于创建 GroupBy 子句的参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: You use the GroupByParameters property to access parameters for the GroupBy clause in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 中的处理程序的 GroupBy 子句中用于访问参数的 GroupByParameters 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the GroupBy clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过添加或移除此集合中的参数来修改 GroupBy 子句。

trans-unit.source: By default, the GroupByParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object contains any parameters that you added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下的 GroupByParameters 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>对象包含添加到任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for the GroupBy clause.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 GroupBy 子句的参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the OrderBy clause.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于创建 OrderBy 子句的参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: You use the OrderByParameters property to access parameters for the OrderBy clause in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序中的 OrderBy 子句中用于访问参数的 OrderByParameters 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the OrderBy clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过添加或移除此集合中的参数来修改 OrderBy 子句。

trans-unit.source: By default, the OrderByParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object contains any parameters that you added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下的 OrderByParameters 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>对象包含添加到任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A> property is set to `true`, parameters in the OrderByParameters collection do not have to be named.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>属性设置为`true`，OrderByParameters 集合中的参数不需要命名为。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateOrderByClause%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data will be ordered based on the sequence of the parameters in the OrderByParameters collection.
trans-unit.target: 数据将基于 OrderByParameters 集合中的参数的序列进行排序。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for the OrderBy clause.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 OrderBy 子句的参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that are used to create the clause that specifies how grouped data is sorted.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于创建指定如何对分组的数据的子句的参数的集合排序。

trans-unit.source: When you group data by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A> property, you can sort the grouped data by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> property to one of the properties used for grouping the data.
trans-unit.target: 数据分组通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>属性，可以通过设置分组的数据进行排序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A>属性设成一个用于对数据进行分组的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsBy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GroupBy%2A>

trans-unit.source: You use the OrderGroupsByParameters property to access parameters for the Order Groups By clause in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 处理程序中的组 Order By 子句中用于访问参数的 OrderGroupsByParameters 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the Order Groups By clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过添加或移除此集合中的参数来修改组 Order By 子句。

trans-unit.source: By default, the OrderGroupsByParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object contains any parameters that you added declaratively to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下的 OrderGroupsByParameters 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>对象包含以声明方式为添加任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.OrderGroupsByParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for the clause that specifies how grouped data is sorted.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定如何对分组的数据的子句的参数的对象进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data object that is used in the data query.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置数据查询中使用的数据对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control applies its query expressions to the object defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件将其查询表达式应用于对象中定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event, you can manually change which object is queried by setting the Result property to an object.
trans-unit.target: 中的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件，你可以手动更改哪种对象查询结果属性设置为一个对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Result property to query an in-memory collection in the Web page, or to get the results from a LINQ query expression.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用的 Result 属性来查询在 Web 页中，内存中的集合，或以获取从 LINQ 查询表达式的结果。

trans-unit.source: You can set the Result property to any object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置为任何对象的 Result 属性。

trans-unit.source: If the object does not implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control wraps the object in an object that does implement the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象没有实现<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>接口，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件中实现的对象中包装对象<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>接口。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: When the Result property is set to any value other than `null`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control does not query the object defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当结果属性设置为任何值以外`null`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件不查询中定义的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it queries the object in the Result property.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它将查询结果属性中的对象。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the Result property to an object, do not use `null` to represent an object that does not contain any data.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时的 Result 属性设置为对象时，不要使用`null`以表示不包含任何数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control interprets `null` to mean that the Result property is not set, and it will create and query the object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件将解释`null`以表示未设置结果属性，并且它将创建和查询中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: To represent an object that does not contain data, set the Result property to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> object that does not contain any elements.
trans-unit.target: 若要表示不包含数据的对象，请将结果属性设置为<xref:System.Collections.IList>或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>不包含任何元素的对象。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> </xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing> events are not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A> property to an object, and when two additional conditions apply.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreating>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreated>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing>时以编程方式设置，将不会引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A>属性到对象，并将应用两个附加条件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextDisposing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.ContextCreating>

trans-unit.source: The conditions are that either the original values do not have to be stored in view state, or the object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A> property implements the <xref:System.Data.Linq.ITable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 条件是原始值不需要存储在或中的对象的视图状态，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A>属性实现<xref:System.Data.Linq.ITable>接口。</xref:System.Data.Linq.ITable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceStatusEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the data for the query.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示查询的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the Select clause.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于创建 Select 子句的参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: You use the SelectParameters property to access parameters for the Select clause in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Select 子句中的处理程序中用于访问参数的 SelectParameters 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the Select clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过添加或移除此集合中的参数来修改 Select 子句。

trans-unit.source: By default, the SelectParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object contains any parameters that you added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下的 SelectParameters 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>对象包含添加到任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for the Select clause.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含的参数的 Select 子句的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of parameters that is used to create the Where clause.
trans-unit.target: 获取参数的集合，用于创建 Where 子句。

trans-unit.source: You use the WhereParameters property to access parameters for the Where clause in a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 访问参数的 WhereParameters 属性用于 Where 子句中的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the Where clause by adding or removing parameters from this collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改 Where 子句通过添加或移除此集合中的参数。

trans-unit.source: By default, the WhereParameters property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object contains any parameters that you added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下的 WhereParameters 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>对象包含添加到任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A>的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.WhereParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When you add parameters through the WhereParameters collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs> object, you must either include a placeholder for the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 添加访问 WhereParameters 集合的参数时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>对象，或者必须包括中的参数的占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>属性或一组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceSelectEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you add a parameter named `ProductName` in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event, you must either set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A> property to `true` or set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> property to `ProductName=@ProductName`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你添加一个名为参数`ProductName`事件处理程序中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>事件，你必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A>属性`true`或设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A>属性`ProductName=@ProductName`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Where%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.AutoGenerateWhereClause%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the parameters for the Where clause.
trans-unit.target: 对象，包含参数的 Where 子句。
